isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-6205/6305)

note.para: Install the individual gear key just before installation of the corresponding gear.

step1.para: With 2nd gear long hub to the shaft front, position the gear and shaft in the press ( Figure 138). Press 2nd gear into place.

figure.caption: Figure 138. Position Gear and Shaft in Press

step1.para: With 3rd gear long hub to the shaft rear, position the gear and shaft in the press ( Figure 139). Press 3rd gear into place.

figure.caption: Figure 139. Position Gear and Shaft in Press

step1.para: Install 4th and drive gear keys on the countershaft ( Figure 140).

figure.caption: Figure 140. Install 4th and Drive Gear Keys on Countershaft

step1.para: Align 4th gear keyway with the shaft key with 4th gear long hub to the shaft front, and position the gear and shaft in the press ( Figure 141). Press 4th gear into place.

figure.caption: Figure 141. Position Gear and Shaft in Press

step1.para: Remove the drive gear key from the countershaft. Install the 4th-drive gear spacer ( Figure 142).

figure.caption: Figure 142. Install 4th-Drive Gear Spacer and Position Gear and Shaft in Press

step1.para: Install the drive gear key on the countershaft.
Align the drive gear keyway with the shaft key with the drive gear long hub to the shaft rear, and position the gear and shaft in the press ( Figure 142). Press the drive gear into place.
Install the drive gear retaining snap ring in the countershaft front groove ( Figure 143).

figure.caption: Figure 143. Install Drive Gear Retaining Snap Ring

step1.para: Use a sleeve type driver or heat lamp and install the front countershaft bearing ( Figure 144).
Use a sleeve type driver or heat lamp and install the rear countershaft bearing ( Figure 145).
